comment: Daily value recalculated from valid 5 minute readings due to 10 minutes missing data caused by instrument check.  23 hours of data is required to calculate a valid daily value.  The recalculation changed the daily value from 8.035 to 8.231.
Missing record on 22/06/2022 for 1 day due to 4.33 hours of missing data while Watercare completed instrument audit.
